sentences.en: 12 A good example is the best sermon.
At High Mass the priest preached a sermon on the devil.
sentences.cn: 牧师在大弥撒上布道驱邪。

sentences.en: Cardinal Murphy will deliver the sermon on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 墨菲红衣主教将在周日布道。

sentences.en: Don't preach me a sermon about being lazy now, please.
sentences.cn: 请勿现在对我讲有关懒惰的大道理.

sentences.en: Don't preach me a sermon, please.
He was preaching me sermon about giving up smoking to his son.
sentences.cn: 他正在对他的儿子讲有关戒烟的大道理.

sentences.en: It is a silly goose that comes to the fox's sermon.
sentences.cn: 唯有傻瓜才来听狐狸的说教.

sentences.en: It is easier than the practice to deliver a sermon.
Sometimes the rector came up and preached a sermon.
sentences.cn: 有时候教区牧师来布道.

sentences.en: The guardian read his ward a sermon on his extravagance.
sentences.cn: 监护人严词申斥被监护人挥霍浪费.

sentences.en: The minister preached a sermon on humility.
sentences.cn: 牧师就谦恭的问题布道.

sentences.en: The minister preaches a sermon now and then.
The preacher blessed the congregation after his sermon.
sentences.cn: 牧师在讲道后祝福会众.

sentences.en: The priest preached a sermon with a trait of humor.
sentences.cn: 那位神父讲道有幽默感.

sentences.en: The priest preached to the congregation about the Sermon on the Mount.
sentences.cn: 那位祭司就山中圣训向会众说教.

sentences.en: The vicar gave a sermon on charity.
sentences.cn: 牧师作了一次关于仁爱的布道。

sentences.en: Yet courage and pride are - we learn in the same sermon - fine qualities.
sentences.cn: 可是在同一篇讲道里告诉我们,勇气和骄傲,都是美德.

phrases.tran_cn: 登山宝训（指圣经马太福音中耶稣在山上所说的话）；山上宝训

trans.tran_cn: 布道，讲道，讲道文章，一大通教训
trans.tran_en: a talk given as part of a Christian church service, usually on a religious or moral subject
